Posts.Content: I am new to cancer compass and i was reading your advice on how to cope and deal with cancer. My sister has urachal cancer and you mentioned CTCA and a second opinion. What exactly is this organiztion or facility? Not worried about the free flight. With regards, Andrea
Posts.Title: What Did i Do, to Get Cancer
